it's not rapid rise or instant yeast and

now one of the things that's really
important in making sure that you have a
donut that's not too greasy is to fry at

degrees it's a pretty high temperature
in terms of frying but you want to make
sure that you're at that temperature
otherwise what will happen if it's too
low the donut itself will start
absorbing a lot of the grease so
maintaining your temperature at 370 is
really important now I'm gonna gently
